OpportunityRelatedDeleteLog.name: OpportunityRelatedDeleteLog
OpportunityRelatedDeleteLog.description: Represents an audit log of the deletion of opportunity-related child records, such as opportunity team members, product splits, or opportunity splits.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only when the multicurrency feature is enabled. Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

DataType.description: Data type of the field that was deleted.

FieldName.description: The name of the field that was deleted.

OpportunityId.description: Required. ID of the associated opportunity.

Parent.description: ID of the record that was deleted. Records with the same Parent text indicate that the value shown in the Value field came from the same record that was previously deleted. Refer to the FieldName field to see which field is being tracked.

SobjectType.description: The object thatâ€™s being recorded for this row of data. Possible values are: OpportunityLineItemSplit OpportunitySplit OpportunityTeamMember

Value.description: The value of the field that was deleted.
